title: EC-Earth3-Veg-LR volcanic forcing not correct in PMIP/past1000
description:
The issue is related to a PMIP experiment� past1000 using EC-Earth3-Veg-LR.
We found that the implemented volcanic forcing did not have any effects on
the global temperature, so we think it was not implemented correctly. We
will unpublish all the data from this experiment. A new experiment will soon
be setup and once it is done, we will republish them.
